LL Privacy supported.

Channel sounding supported.

briefdescription.para: Feature bits controlled by the host.

detaileddescription.para: All feature mask, need to be updated when new features are added.
Operational mode flags. Perform version exchange LLCP at connection establishment.
MD bit set if data transmitted.
Bypass end of CE guard.
Master retransmits after receiving NACK.
Master ignores LL_CONNECTION_PARAM_RSP.
Master unconditionally accepts LL_CONNECTION_PARAM_RSP. (LL_OP_MODE_FLAG_MST_IGNORE_CP_RSP must be cleared).
Perform data length update LLCP at connection establishment.
Require symmetric PHYs for connection.
Perform feature exchange LLCP at connection establishment.
Slave delays LLCP startup procedures.
Enable slave latency wake up upon data pending.
Enable ADI field for aux scan.
Enable CIS master sends additional NULL PDU for acknowledge scheme.
AdvA will be included in AUX_ADV_IND instead of ADV_EXT_IND.
Enable advertising channel randomization.
Enable power monitoring.
Enable BIS receive duplicates.
Enable HCI ISO lost SDU notification.
Perform channel report LLCP after feature exchange.
Ignore timestamp of Rx packet with CRC error.
Force CIS to use Coded PHY with S2 option.
Terminate connection when getting an invalid ECU IND.
Use parent AuxAdv Tx power for BIS Tx power.
Enable extended interval.
Enable extended advertising data only in AUX_CHAIN_IND.
Enable extended advertising data only in AUX_EXT_IND.
Disable autonomous feature exchange.
Use adjacent BOD scheduling for CIG.
Enable early sending of the CIE bit.
Use reservation manager BOD scheduling for BIG.
Enable advertising delay.
Enable scan backoff.
Enable window widening.
Enable slave latency.
Enable LLCP timer.
Enable connection events subrating.
Enable duplicate connection validation.

briefdescription.para: The following status values are used in the LL API.

detaileddescription.para: Role is master.
Role is slave.

briefdescription.para: This parameter identifies the device role.

detaileddescription.para: Connectable undirected advertising. Peer devices can scan and connect to this device.
Connectable directed advertising, high duty cycle. Only a specified peer device can connect to this device.
Scannable undirected advertising. Peer devices can scan this device but cannot connect.
Non-connectable undirected advertising. Peer devices cannot scan or connect to this device.
Connectable directed advertising, low duty cycle. Only a specified peer device can connect to this device.

briefdescription.para: The advertising type indicates the connectable and discoverable nature of the advertising packets transmitted by a device.

detaileddescription.para: Scan from any device.
Scan from White List only.
Connect from While List only.
Scan and connect from While List only.
Connectable advertising.
Scannable advertising.
Directed advertising.
High Duty Cycle advertising.
Use legacy advertising PDUs.
Omit advertiser's address from all PDUs (anonymous advertising).
Include TxPower in the advertising PDU.
Use decision PDUs when advertising.
Include AdvA in the extended header of all decision PDUs.
Include ADI in the extended header of all decision PDUs.
Intermediate fragment.
First fragment.
Last fragment.
Complete extended advertising data.
Unchanged data (just update the Advertising DID).
Controller may fragment all Host advertising data.
Controller should not fragment nor minimize fragmentation of Host advertising data.
Passive scanning.
Active scanning.
Filter accept list not used, Decision PDUs ignored, Peer_Address and Type used.
Filter accept list used, Decision PDUs ignored, Peer_Address and Type ignored.
Filter accept list not used, Only decision PDUs, Peer_Address and Type ignored.

Primary filtering bit.
Extended filtering bit.
Filter all PDUs.
Filter decisions only.
Use advSID, advAddrType and advAddr to filter.
Use the periodic advertiser list.
Duplicate filtering disabled.
Duplicate filtering enabled.
Duplicate filtering enabled, reset for each scan period.

pCfg
Pointer to runtime configuration parameters.
This function returns default value for the LL subsystem's runtime configurations.

pCfg
Pointer to runtime configuration parameters (data must be static).
This function initializes the LL subsystem's runtime configuration.

simplesect.para: This routine must be called only once before any other initialization routines.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to initial seed for random numbers.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem with task handler.

detaileddescription.para:
handlerId
WSF handler ID.
This function initializes the LL subsystem. It is called once upon system initialization. It must be called before any other function in the LL API is called.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem for operation for power control.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the LL subsystem for power control.
Reset the LL subsystem. All active connections are closed and all radio procedures such as scanning or advertising are terminated.

evtCback
Client callback function.
This function is called by a client to register for LL events.

sendCompCback
Client ACL send complete callback function.
recvPendCback
Client ACL receive pending callback function.
This function is called by a client to register for ACL data.

sendIsoCompCback
Client ISO send complete callback function.
recvIsoPendCback
Client ISO receive pending callback function.
This function is called by a client to register for ISO data.

pAddr
Bluetooth device address.
Set the BD address to be used by LL.

pAddr
Bluetooth device address.
Get the BD address currently used by LL or all zeros if address is not set.

pAddr
Random Bluetooth device address.
Status.
Set the random address to be used by LL.

pAddr
Random Bluetooth device address.
Status error code.
Get the random address currently used by LL or all zeros if address is not set.

pStates
Supported states bitmask.
Return the states supported by the LL.

pFeatures
Supported features bitmask.
Return the LE features supported by the LL.

pFeatures
Supported features bitmask.
Status error code.
This function must only be called when controller is not connected to another device.
Set the LE features supported by the LL.

bitNum
Bit position in the FeatureSet.
bitVal
Enable or disable feature.
Status error code.
Set or clear a bit in the feature controlled by the Host in the Link Layer FeatureSet stored in the Controller.

interval
Base interval of the ecosystem.
Status error code.
Set an ecosystem base interval to provide a hint specifying the base communication interval the Controller can expect current and future communications to use.

pRandNum
Buffer to store 8 bytes random data.
Status error code.
Request the LL to generate a random number.

Total number of white list entries.
Read the white list capacity supported by the LL.

Status error code.
Clear all white list entries stored in the LL.

simplesect.para: This function must only be called when advertising or scan is disabled and not initiating.

briefdescription.para: Add device to the white list.

detaileddescription.para:
addrType
Address type.
pAddr
Bluetooth device address.

Adds the given address to the white list stored in the LL.

briefdescription.para: Remove device from the white list.

detaileddescription.para:
addrType
Address type.
pAddr
Bluetooth device address.

Removes the given address from the white list stored in the LL.

simplesect.para: This function must only be called when advertising or scan is disabled and not initiating.

pPeerIdentityAddr
Peer identity address.
Status error code.
Remove device from resolving list.

Status error code.
Clear resolving list.

pSize
Storage for resolving list size.

Read number of address translation entries that can be stored in the resolving list.

addrType
Peer identity address type.
pIdentityAddr
Peer identity address.
pRpa
Storage for peer resolvable private address

addrType
Peer identity address type.
pIdentityAddr
Peer identity address.
pRpa
Storage for peer resolvable private address
Status error code.
Get the local resolvable private address that is currently being used for the peer identity address.

enable
Set to true to enable address resolution or false to disable address resolution.
Status error code.
Enable or disable address resolution so that received local or peer resolvable private addresses are resolved.

rpaTimeout
Timeout measured in seconds.
Status error code.
Set the time period between automatic generation of new resolvable private addresses.

peerAddrType
Peer identity address type.
pPeerIdentityAddr
Peer identity address.
privMode
Privacy mode.
Status error code.
Allow the host to specify the privacy mode to be used for a given entry on the resolving list.

briefdescription.para: Generate a P-256 public/private key pair.

detaileddescription.para:
Status error code.
Generate a P-256 public/private key pair. If another ECC operation (P-256 key pair or Diffie- Hellman key generation) is ongoing, an error will be returned.

pubKey_x
Remote public key x-coordinate.
pubKey_y
Remote public key y-coordinate.
Status error code.
Generate a Diffie-Hellman key from a remote public key and the local private key. If another ECC operation (P-256 key pair or Diffie-Hellman key generation) is ongoing, an error will be returned.

pubKey_x
Remote public key x-coordinate.
pubKey_y
Remote public key y-coordinate.
keyType
debug enable
Status error code.
Generate a Diffie-Hellman key from a remote public key and the local private key. If another ECC operation (P-256 key pair or Diffie-Hellman key generation) is ongoing, an error will be returned. If keyType == 1, debug keys will be used in place for the keys.

briefdescription.para: Set P-256 private key for debug purposes.

detaileddescription.para:
privKey
Private key, or all zeros to clear set private key.
Status error code.
Set P-256 private key or clear set private key. The private key will be used for generate key pairs and Diffie-Hellman keys until cleared.

pChanMap
Channel map (0=bad, 1=usable).
Status error code.
Set the channel class. At least 2 bits must be set.

flags
Flags.
enable
true to set flags or false to clear flags.
Status error code.
Set mode flags governing LL operations.

advTxPwr
Advertising transmit power level.
Set the advertising transmit power.

pAdvTxPwr
Advertising transmit power level.
Status error code.
Return the advertising transmit power.
